sowing: The best time for sowing green gram is the last week of June to the first week of July.
varieties: Some improved varieties of green gram are Pusa Vishal, PDM-139, and IPM-2-3.
fertilizer: Apply 20 kg of nitrogen and 40 kg of phosphorus per hectare at the time of sowing.
irrigation: Green gram is a rainfed crop, but if there is a long dry spell, one irrigation at the flowering stage is beneficial.
weed_control: Weed control is essential for good yield. Manual weeding can be done 20-25 days after sowing.
